Overview.name: Overview0
Overview.content: OpenCms supports automated PDF generation. It's mainly intended to render your content in a PDF file. Here, we show you how to render a demo article as PDF.

Teaser.name: Teaser0
Teaser.content: Get your content as PDF - see how it  works for a demo article.

Link.LinkText: Flying Saucer - the library we use for rendering PDFs

LinkDescription.name: LinkDescription0
LinkDescription.content: Flying Saucer is a freely available Java library for generating PDF output from XML documents. In particular it allows XHTML with CSS 2.1 styles (plus some extensions) as input. And that's what we feed it with.
